title: Soothe Your Soul
description: New age gifts store stocking a variety of items including bulk herbs and flowers, essential oils, aromatherapy, beads, natural candles, gems and crystals, organic bed sheets, books on health, spirituality, and natural living. Offers classes on healthy eating, how to make coconut water kefir, how to sprout, as well as on aromatherapy. New location since fall 2012; previoulsy at 415 N Pacific Coast Hwy, Redondo Beach.
